patthana24.10:4.1: Nasahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:4.2: Naahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:4.3: Nasahetukaṃ nahetuñca naahetukaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:4.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … purejāte āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana24.10:5.1: Nasahetukaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.10:6.1: Naahetukaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.10:6.4: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana24.10:7.1: Nahetusampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.10:8.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … purejāte āsevane tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana24.10:9.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:10.1: Naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:11.1: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.10:12.1: Nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
